name: Dan Maurice MYERS and Barbara Jean Myers v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE
name_abbreviation: Myers v. Commonwealth, Department of Revenue

judges: Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
O’BRIEN, C. J., and WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Dan Maurice MYERS and Barbara Jean Myers v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
O’BRIEN, C. J., and WILKINSON, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Gordon A. Roe, York, for appellant.
Elisabeth S. Shuster, Deputy Atty. Gen., Christos Katsaounis, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
430 A.2d 1154
Dan Maurice MYERS and Barbara Jean Myers v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 21, 1981.
Decided June 4, 1981.
Gordon A. Roe, York, for appellant.
Elisabeth S. Shuster, Deputy Atty. Gen., Christos Katsaounis, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellees.
Before ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
